ygData.subject: Re: Sol A anyone?
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok Harmonic, your on! sounds like you have plans for friday and saturday nite getting things from perma, so how about sunday.... tell me in game tonite a time
ygData.messageBody:
Ok Harmonic, your on! sounds like you have plans for friday and saturday
nite getting things from perma, so how about sunday.... tell me in game
tonite a time and a place to meet up. Also if there are any other bards from
Innoruuk reading this thread I will help you when you become old enough to
party in Sol A as well..hehe Harmonic is not the only golden toungued bard
in need of a wardrobe..and lets face it..clothes definately help make the
bard..right Darrian?!

One last thing..I tend to "hand down" my old stuff to my fellow bards. So
feel free to send tells inquiring if I have anything to pass on. At this
time I have nothing, but give it a week... :)

Elyana Silvanae
Bardesss of the 36th Chorus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server

>I am definitely up for SolA this weekend, if it's convenient.
>The charred BP would be nice, I just get lost in the gnome
>castle too often.

>Harmonic Distortion, 30th drummer.
